phrs.translation: 伯爵茶（一种红茶）；格雷伯爵（英国贵族头衔）

sentences.sentence: The new Earl did not see them.
sentences.translation: 新伯爵并没有看到他们。

sentences.sentence: Will it please your royal highness to dismiss all that attend you here, save my lord the Earl of Hertford?
sentences.translation: 除了赫德福伯爵之外，请殿下让所有在这里的侍从都退下好吗？
